channel.title: Prophecy on Disciple School
channel.description: Recent content in Prophecy on Disciple School

item.title: The 'End' Game
item.description: Feathers for Worms Let’s begin with a parable. One day long ago, over the hot sands of a Middle Eastern country, a white skylark flew in joyous loops about the sky. As she swooped near the earth, she heard a merchant cry out, “Worms! Worms! Worms for feathers! Delicious worms!” The skylark circled about the merchant, hungry at the mention of worms, but puzzled about what the merchant meant. Seeing that the skylark was interested, the merchant motioned her nearer.
